LanguageData.CR_InitializeValueAllReally: I will reset all settings, are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.CR_CleanLoadDesc: Overwrites all configuration items with the old settings.
LanguageData.CR_MergeLoadDesc: Only setting items that have been changed from the default values in the old settings will be overwritten.
LanguageData.CR_MainSectionTitle: Main Enhance Function: Enhancement by "Compressed Raider" Hediff
LanguageData.CR_ChanceOfCompressionDesc: The probability of performing compression.\nIf the value is less than 1, compression will be performed only if the probability judgment succeeds.\n(0.01 is equivalent to 1%) (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_ChanceOfEnhancementDesc:
The probability of performing compression-related enhancements.(0.01 is equivalent to 1%)
If the value is less than 1, enhancements will be performed only if the probability judgment succeeds.
This probability judgment is done separately for each raider.
(Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_CalcBaseMultByEnhancedDesc: Toggles the Calculate the "Base Multiplier" by enhanced raiders number ON/OFF. (Default: ON)
LanguageData.CR_AllowMechanoidsDesc: Toggles the allow of compress Mechanoid ON/OFF. (Default: ON)
LanguageData.CR_AllowInsectoidsDesc: Toggles the allow of compress Insectoid ON/OFF. (Default: ON)
LanguageData.CR_AllowManhuntersDesc: Toggles the allow of compress Manhunter ON/OFF. (Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_AllowRaidFriendlyDesc: Toggles the allow of compress Friendly ON/OFF. (Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_MaxRaidPawnsCountDesc: Set the "Raid pawn max number". If set to 0, A normal raid will take place. (Default: 100)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultDesc: Set the "Common enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement factors are disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultRaidFriendlyDesc: Set the "Common enhancement factor(Friendly)". If set to 0, this enhancement factors are disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_DisplayMessageDesc: Toggles the show compressed result message ON/OFF. (Default: ON)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultPainDesc: Set the "Pain resistance enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultArmorRating_BluntDesc: Set the "Armor - Blunt enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultArmorRating_SharpDesc: Set the "Armor - Sharp enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultArmorRating_HeatDesc: Set the "Armor - Heat enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultMeleeDodgeChanceDesc: Set the "Melee dodge chance enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultMeleeHitChanceDesc: Set the "Melee hit chance enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultMoveSpeedDesc: Set the "Move speed enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultShootingAccuracyPawnDes: Set the "Shooting accuracy enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultPawnTrapSpringChanceDes: Set the "Trap dodge chance enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxPainDesc: Set the "Pain resistance enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxArmorRating_BluntDesc: Set the "Armor - Blunt enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxArmorRating_SharpDesc: Set the "Armor - Sharp enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxArmorRating_HeatDesc: Set the "Armor - Heat enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxMeleeDodgeChanceDesc: Set the "Melee dodge chance enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 20)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxMeleeHitChanceDesc: Set the "Melee hit chance enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 20)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxMoveSpeedDesc: Set the "Move speed enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 20)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxShootingAccuracyPawnDesc: Set the "Shooting accuracy enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 20)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxPawnTrapSpringChanceDesc: Set the "Trap dodge chance enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacitySightDesc: Set the "Sight enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityMovingDesc: Set the "Moving enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityHearingDesc: Set the "Hearing enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityManipulationDes: Set the "Manipulation enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityMetabolismDesc: Set the "Metabolism enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityConsciousnessDe: Set the "Consciousness enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityBloodFiltration: Set the "Blood filtration enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityBloodPumpingDes: Set the "Blood pumping enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMultCapacityBreathingDesc: Set the "Breathing enhancement factor". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 0.25)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacitySightDesc: Set the "Sight enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityMovingDesc: Set the "Moving enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityHearingDesc: Set the "Hearing enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityManipulationDesc: Set the "Manipulation enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityMetabolismDesc: Set the "Metabolism enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityConsciousnessDes: Set the "Consciousness enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityBloodFiltrationD: Set the "Blood filtration enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityBloodPumpingDesc: Set the "Blood pumping enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_GainFactorMaxCapacityBreathingDesc: Set the "Breathing enhancement max value". If set to 0, this enhancement item is disabled. (Default: 5)
LanguageData.CR_AddBionicsChanceFactorDesc: Set the factor of the bionics addition chance.\nSetting to 0 disables the "Add Bionics". (Default: 2)
LanguageData.CR_AddBionicsChanceMaxDesc: Set the max value of the bionics addition chance.\nSetting to 0 disables the "Add Bionics". (Default: 0.9)
LanguageData.CR_AddBionicsChanceNegativeCurveDesc: Set the negative curve of the bionics addition chance.\nThis is the percentage reduction in the chance of bionics addition after the second one. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_AddBionicsMaxNumberDesc: Set the maximum number of bionics that can be added to a single raider. (Default: 4)
LanguageData.CR_AllowedByGTTechLevelDesc:
Set the raider's TechLevel at which bionics additions are allowed. (Default: 0)
The setting values are as follows.
0:ALL
1:Above Animal
2:Above Neolithic
3:Above Medieval
4:Above Industrial
5:Above Spacer
6:Above Ultra
7:Above Archotech.
LanguageData.CR_RefineGearChanceFactorDesc: Set the factor of the refine gear chance.\nSetting to 0 disables the "Refine Gear". (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_RefineGearChanceMaxDesc: Set the max value of the refine gear chance.\nSetting to 0 disables the "Refine Gear". (Default: 0.9)
LanguageData.CR_RefineGearChanceNegativeCurveDesc: Set the negative curve of the refine gear chance.\nThis is the percentage reduction in the chance of strengthening equipment of two or more ranks. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_QualityUpMaxNumDesc: Set the max number of quality up.\nThis is the upper limit of gear quality up. (Default: 4)
LanguageData.CR_OptionSetBiocodeDesc: Toggles ON/OFF the function to grant "Biocode" upon successful weapon refinement.(Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_OptionAddDeathAcidifierDesc: Toggles ON/OFF the function to grant "Death acidifier" upon successful apparel refinement.(Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_AddDrugChanceFactorDesc: Set the factor of the drug effects addition chance.\nSetting to 0 disables the "Add Drug Effects". (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_AddDrugChanceMaxDesc: Set the max value of the drug effects addition chance.\nSetting to 0 disables the "Add Drug Effects". (Default: 0.9)
LanguageData.CR_AddDrugChanceNegativeCurveLabel: Negative curve of drug effects addition
LanguageData.CR_AddDrugChanceNegativeCurveDesc: Set the negative curve of the drug effects addition chance.\nThis is the percentage reduction in the chance of drug effects addition after the second one. (Default: 0.5)
LanguageData.CR_AddDrugMaxNumberLabel: Max number of drug effects addition
LanguageData.CR_AddDrugMaxNumberDesc: Set the maximum number of drug effects that can be added to a single raider.\nWhen increasing this value, consider enabling "Avoid bad effects" since the overall negative impact is likely to be stronger. (Default: 1)
LanguageData.CR_GiveOnlyActiveIngredientsDesc:
Toggles the avoid chemical damage function ON/OFF when giving drugs.
When this is ON, if you want to prevent dependency and bad effects of drug overdose.
However, only "Luciferium" will ignore this setting and develop dependence because its primary effects are permanent.
Also, if the drug contains side effects in its primary effect, those side effects are unavoidable. (Default: ON)
LanguageData.CR_IgnoreNonVolatilityDrugsLabel: Permenent drug's bad effect is forced
LanguageData.CR_IgnoreNonVolatilityDrugsDesc: Toggles the function that allows permenent drugs to inflict chemical damage without regard to the chemical damage avoidance settings.\n"Luciferium" ignores these settings and always inflicts chemical damage. (Default: ON)
LanguageData.CR_WithoutSocialDrugDesc: Toggles the exclude "Social" category drugs function ON/OFF from the lottery. "Social" category drugs include "Beer", "Psychite tea", etc. (Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_WithoutHardDrugDesc: Toggles the exclude "Hard" category drugs function ON/OFF from the lottery. "Hard" category drugs include "Yayo", "Go-juice", etc. (Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_WithoutMedicalDrugDesc: Toggles the exclude "Medical" category drugs function ON/OFF from the lottery. "Medical" category drugs include "Luciferium", etc. (Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_WithoutNonVolatilityDrugDesc: Toggles the exclude permenent drugs function ON/OFF from the lottery. Turn this on if you want to exclude drugs with permanent effects, such as "Luciferium". (Default: OFF)
LanguageData.CR_LimitationsByTechLevelDesc: Toggles the takes the "TechLevel" into account for the dragging lot criteria function ON/OFF. (Default: ON)
LanguageData.CR_TechLevelUpperRangeDesc: Extends coverage to drugs of a "TechLevel" upper than the raider faction's "TechLevel" by this number. (Default: 2)
LanguageData.CR_TechLevelLowerRangeDesc: Extends coverage to drugs of a "TechLevel" lower than the raider faction's "TechLevel" by this number. (Default: 2)
